name: Accelerated Dual Degree: Bachelor of Science in Biomedical Engineering, Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine

Accelerated Dual Degree: Bachelor of Sci: Accelerated Dual Degree: Bachelor of Science in Biomedical Engineering, Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine Rowan University Graduation Requirements • Students must complete at least 120 s.h. (semester hours) of coursework that applies to their Rowan University degree • Students must have an overall/cum. G.P.A. of at least 2.0. (Only Rowan University courses count toward the G.P.A.) • A minimum of 30 s.h. of coursework must be completed at/through Rowan University • Only grades of “D-” or above may apply to graduation requirements (some programs may set higher minimums) • Students must apply for graduation and should do so for the term in which they will complete all program requirements.
Undergraduate Program Requirements: 120: Undergraduate Program Requirements: 120 s.h. As listed in Bachelor of Science in Biomedical Engineering Please consult with your advisor to ensure you have taken all prerequisite courses
Transition into DO program: Transition into DO program In addition to the coursework required for the BS Degree, successful transition into the DO program requires: • Pre-Requisite Coursework for Medical School Admission/Preparedness (see below) • MCAT Scores at or above the metric established by the combined program • Cumulative GPA at or above the requirement established by the combined program • Demonstration of continued participation and leadership in extracurricular activities and preparedness for a career in medicine • Completion of the standard application • Admissions interview

notes: Pre-Requisite Coursework Required for Accelerated Medical Program Not explicitly required for BS Degree. These courses may fulfill requirements in the BS degree if applicable.
BIOL, MCB - One additional semester of biology coursework (with lab) to complete 1 full year of biology - Could also count as Advanced Science Elective
PSY 01107 - Essentials of Psychology Recommended - Could also fulfill Rowan Core requirements Credits: 3
